entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:26 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cobourg 04:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: ENE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain beginning this morning. Risk of freezing rain late this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 early in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
